basics.name: Sofia Kirsanova
basics.label: Ph.D. student in Knowledge Computing Lab at the University of Minnesota

projects.name: IMOLA: Automated Road Network Extraction & Topological Mapping
projects.summary:
sponsor: NSF
advisor: Dr. Yao-Yi Chiang
status: ongoing
highlights: Developing deep-learning methods for extracting road networks from maps and building topology reconstruction algorithms

projects.name: CriticalMAAS: Legend Detection & Map Layout Analysis
projects.summary:
sponsor: DARPA CriticalMAAS
advisor: Dr. Yao-Yi Chiang
status: completed
highlights: Developed deep-learning methods for legend detection, achieving 96% symbol-detection F1 and 97.1% symbol-description linking accuracy

projects.name: Methods for Detecting Critical Events in System Log Data
highlights: Developed NLP-inspired preprocessing and semantic extraction techniques for unstructured system logs
Built CNN-based anomaly detectors achieving 98% accuracy on processed logs and 82% on raw logs
Proposed process-mining-based clustering for modeling log-event sequences at scale

projects.name: Monte Carlo Algorithms for Connect6
highlights: Benchmarked heuristic algorithms for stochastic gameplay modeling and showed Monte Carlo methods outperform classical heuristics

work.name: Rotec Digital Solutions, Moscow, Russia
work.summary: Developed ML models for anomaly detection in industrial sensor and time-series data for predictive maintenance
highlights: Integrated models into monitoring pipelines using PyTorch, scikit-learn, PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, MLflow, DVC, Airflow, Optuna

work.name: MOLNET, Moscow, Russia
work.summary: Implemented backend systems using Java, Spring, JSP, Maven, REST APIs, and PostgreSQL
highlights: Built web interfaces with React, TypeScript, Bootstrap; used Docker, Git, and Linux in daily development

awards.title: TV NeuroTech hackathon. 1st prize
awards.summary: Case: to find, formalize and explore the statistical validity of the dependencies of indicators of the quality of life of the population (income, demography, credit burden, etc.) on the indicators of state resource provision | Data: official statistics of the Russian Federation for the last 10-15 years | My task was to detect and clean outliers in the data.
